statements: SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_reports
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE satisfaction_level > 4
SELECT report_id, customer_id, satisfaction_level, service_response_time FROM customer_satisfaction_reports ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC
SELECT report_id, customer_id FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE service_response_time < 30
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM customer_satisfaction_reports
SELECT report_id, satisfaction_level, service_response_time, customer_id FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE satisfaction_level > 4.5 ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND satisfaction_level < 3;
SELECT report_id, service_response_time FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE service_response_time BETWEEN 10 AND 30 ORDER BY report_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM customer_satisfaction_reports GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_satisfaction > 4;
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_level) AS max_satisfaction_level, MIN(satisfaction_level) AS min_satisfaction_level FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE customer_id IN (1001, 1002);
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_reports;
SELECT report_id, satisfaction_rating, report_date FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM customer_satisfaction_reports GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM service_response_times ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, service_type FROM service_response_times WHERE response_time < 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_rating) as avg_rating FROM customer_satisfaction_reports GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;

SELECT cs.customer_id, sr.service_type, sr.response_time FROM customer_satisfaction_reports cs JOIN service_response_times sr ON cs.customer_id = sr.customer_id WHERE sr.response_time < 30 ORDER BY cs.report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, customer_id FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(satisfaction_rating) as max_rating, MIN(satisfaction_rating) as min_rating FROM customer_satisfaction_reports GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_rating - min_rating >= 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSatisfactionReports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM CustomerSatisfactionReports WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM ServiceResponseTimes WHERE response_time < 30 ORDER BY response_time ASC;
SELECT report_date, satisfaction_level FROM CustomerSatisfactionReports WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSatisfactionReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM CustomerSatisfactionReports WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT report_id, customer_id, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM report_date) AS report_month FROM CustomerSatisfactionReports WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM report_date) = 2022;
SELECT * FROM ServiceResponseTimes WHERE response_time <= 5 AND response_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM service_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_location DESC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level, feedback FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT service_id, response_time FROM service_response_times WHERE response_time < 10 ORDER BY response_time ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, service_id, interaction_datetime, interaction_details FROM customer_service_interaction ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_reports ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT service_id, AVG(response_time) AS average_response_time FROM service_response_times GROUP BY service_id HAVING average_response_time < 10;

SELECT customer_id, provider_name FROM customer_service_interaction JOIN service_providers ON customer_service_interaction.service_id = service_providers.provider_id ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, service_id, interaction_datetime, interaction_details FROM customer_service_interaction WHERE interaction_details LIKE '%complaint%'
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction;
SELECT satisfaction_score, date_of_survey FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, date_of_feedback FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY date_of_feedback DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM service_agents WHERE agent_department = 'Support';
SELECT service_id, response_time_in_minutes, date_of_service FROM service_response_times WHERE response_time_in_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, date_of_survey FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score > 8;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE date_of_feedback BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM service_agents WHERE agent_department = 'Support' ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT service_id, AVG(response_time_in_minutes) AS avg_response_time FROM service_response_times GROUP BY service_id HAVING avg_response_time > 20;
